abstract: Meet Ted, for whom kite-flying is a way of life. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from Moyne'.
description: Ted the kite man is a Port Fairy icon.  A long time resident, Ted has a kite shop, a big heart, and a contagious philosophy as he encourages kids to explore the winds and the outdoors flying their kites.  He and his partner build kites with 3,000 children a year and he believes flying a kite helps you forget all your concerns of the day while participating in this peaceful activity.
